response.overview: Patrick, a dwarf junkie, and father-to-be, wants to clean up his act. But his dealers (The Cat and The Fox) have something else in mind : Patrick has to dress up as Pinocchio to steal money from a pedophile, schizophrenic, psychopath who thinks he is Geppetto. This dark diesel-punk comedy is a devilish reinterpretation of the original story 'The adventures of Pinocchio' by Collodi.
response.title: Extrême Pinocchio
